channel.title: Www files help (wamp server)
channel.description:
First of all, I get an error saying that I have a "BAD HTTP REFFERER" and that my "BASE URL" is incorrect. My base url is http://localhost/forum i believe (since thats the url of my forums) so how do i change the base url to that? Ive tried putting that in options but it still gives me the error [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/546/screenshot20121010at125.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img546/8517/screenshot20121010at125.th.png[/img][/URL]
Secondly, why does my other website show up all choppy and out of order like this? It should be black and neatly organized. How do I fix this? :P [URL=http://imageshack.us/photo/my-images/526/screenshot20121010at124.png/][IMG]http://imageshack.us/a/img526/8868/screenshot20121010at124.th.png[/img][/URL]
thanks guys

item.title: Www files help (wamp server)
item.dc:creator: @Snemo Snemo
item.description:
@Snemo wrote:

[quote=“KempiScape, post:6, topic:463722”][quote author=Snemo link=topic=567341.msg4122462#msg4122462 date=1349912471]

Probably css is missing

what is css?
[/quote]
The style sheet of a website, used for making a html page look neatly organized.
The file is probably unreachable, idk where you can fix this in your forum software.[/quote]

well it used to work just fine tho, all of a sudden it just appeared like this.

Ive tried resetting the cache and cookies but it didnt do shit lol

Read full topic

[/quote]

what is css?[/quote]
The style sheet of a website, used for making a html page look neatly organized.
The file is probably unreachable, idk where you can fix this in your forum software.

item.title: Www files help (wamp server)

item.description:
@Snemo wrote:

First of all, I get an error saying that I have a “BAD HTTP REFFERER” and that my “BASE URL” is incorrect.
My base url is http://localhost/forum i believe (since thats the url of my forums) so how do i change the base url to that? Ive tried putting that in options but it still gives me the error

Secondly, why does my other website show up all choppy and out of order like this?
It should be black and neatly organized. How do I fix this?

thanks guys
